verses.kjv: That which was from the beginning, which we have heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we have looked upon, and our hands have handled, of the Word of life;
verses.ct: We are writing to you about what has existed from the very beginning — what we heard with our own ears, saw with our own eyes, observed closely, and touched with our own hands — the Word of life.

verses.kjv: (For the life was manifested, and we have seen it, and bear witness, and shew unto you that eternal life, which was with the Father, and was manifested unto us;)
verses.ct: (This life was revealed to us. We witnessed it personally, and now we testify about it and announce to you this eternal life that existed with the Father and was revealed to us.)

verses.kjv: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: What we have seen and heard, we are now sharing with you so that you can have a deep connection with us. And our connection is with the Father and with his Son Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: And these things write we unto you, that your joy may be full.
verses.ct: We are writing these things to you so that your joy will be complete.

verses.kjv: This then is the message which we have heard of him, and declare unto you, that God is light, and in him is no darkness at all.
verses.ct: This is the message we received from him and are passing on to you: God is light, and there is absolutely no darkness in him.

verses.kjv: If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie, and do not the truth:
verses.ct: If we claim to have a connection with him but continue living in darkness, we are lying and not living by the truth.

verses.kjv: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.
verses.ct: But if we live in the light, just as he is in the light, we share a genuine connection with each other, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son purifies us from every sin.

verses.kjv: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.
verses.ct: If we claim to be without sin, we are fooling ourselves, and the truth has no place in us.

verses.kjv: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.ct: But if we openly admit our sins, he is faithful and just — he will forgive our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.

verses.kjv: If we say that we have not sinned, we make him a liar, and his word is not in us.
verses.ct: If we claim that we haven't sinned, we are calling him a liar, and his word has no place in us.
